item.title: Simple Neural Network in Pytorch
item.description: The only pre-requeste to understanding this simple article is just the basic understanding of python. We are going to create a simple regressor - a model which is used for predicting the continuous variable - in pytorch. Dataset First, create a dataset containing our observations(examples) and the labels associated with each observation. import torch # column 1 mu1,sig1 = 0,0.1 x1 = np.random.normal(mu1,sig1,(100)) x1 = x1.reshape(100,1) # column 2 mu2,sig2 = 1,1.
